name: Wall of obstacles
description:
Don't hit the obstacles in this endless game, where the obstacles speed up as the game progresses, until it reaches a permanent speed, get a highscore, get achievements. 

Made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2020. The theme was holes. 

Controls: "A" & "D" or Arrow keys to move left and right. "R" to restart quickly.

Engine: Unity

Music: Bosca Ceoil
